title: Efficient photocatalytic degradation of ofloxacin by polyimide/phosphate-doped porous coralline carbon nitride S-scheme heterojunction
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00277F, Paper
Yufeng Zeng, Yishun Wang, Xicheng Wang, Kun Chen, Ping Chen, Zhenjun Xiao, Qianxin Zhang, Wenying Lv, Guoguang Liu
The establishment of heterojunction between two semiconductors possessing compatible band structures holds significant promise for facilitating the separation and migration of photogenerated carriers, thereby engendering robust photooxidation-reduction capabilities. Herein, a...
